evidence.claim: P3 Health Partners utilizes AWS cloud services for scalability and data management.
P3 Health Partners is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of health information.
They leverage FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
P3 employs EDI transactions to facilitate healthcare billing and claims processing.
The company uses Microsoft Azure for data storage and analysis.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes HIPAA & X12 for healthcare data exchange; targets EDI integration clearly.
matched_use_cases: EDI integration with payers and providers
